eligibility.notes: In-app + 7-ELEVEN COD; opened ~14h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: Neutral
snadResult.reason: The seller provided the headphones in a state where the listing doesn’t explicitly state the inclusion of the USB-C cable. The user’s complaint focuses on a missing element that isn’t a material mismatch, but a difference in the listing versus the delivered item. The description of the listing focuses on the headphone’s color and functionality, not its accessory. There’s no clear indication of a material mismatch or a conflict between the listing and the delivered item.

primaryOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
primaryOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-12033
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The seller provided the headphones in a state where the listing doesn’t explicitly state the inclusion of the USB-C cable. The user’s complaint focuses on a missing element that isn’t a material mismatch, but a difference in the listing versus the delivered item. The description of the listing focuses on the headphone’s color and functionality, not its accessory. There’s no clear indication of a material mismatch or a conflict between the listing and the delivered item.
Decision: Neutral
Outcome: The dispute was settled with a partial refund of 300 TWD to the buyer.
